testcase.name: Make purchase on the website
testcase.system-out: Given I am able to login using valid credentials............................passed And I search a "Iguana" food in the "Reptiles" area.........................passed And I add a product to my Cart..............................................passed When I click on Proceed to checkout.........................................passed And I click to submit the order.............................................passed Then I should see an order confirmation.....................................passed
